enum: not in list - try it anyway
model.title: Model number (i.e. IBS-TH1, leave empty if not sure)

mac_address.title: Bluetooth MAC address for sensor (xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx). If empty, then first sensor to be found will be used - see log for MAC found.

storage.title: Storage of history values (filesystem or googleDrive)

loglevel.title: The log level at start - smaller number less messages (0 = Fatal, 1 = Error, 2 = Warning, 3 = Info (default), 4 = Debug)
